instruction: Summarise the effects of social media on society.
output: Social media has had a profound impact on society, both positively and negatively. On one hand, it has enabled unparalleled levels of connection and communication between individuals. On the other hand, it has facilitated the spread of misinformation and exposed people to cyberbullying and hatred. Overall, the effects of social media on society are still being determined, yet its impact on aspects of people’s lives such as education and communication is undeniable.
